title: Looking for someone to help me improve
body:
I am currently gold IV and I always get matched with gold 3 - plat v average elo so i'm looking for someone at least plat 3 or higher to tutor me or just help me improve because i've been gold for 3 seasons now :/ 
cheers :)

replies.body: write down on a piece of paper when you make a mistake, don't make the mistake again, THERE! you can teach yourself :>
Yes i alwasy try to think what i did wrong, but i dont know. i never seem to know where i went wrong it just seems as i got very unlucky but i know its just me playing bad

> [{quoted}](name=2 Girls 1 Gragas,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4nGuh4Yw,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-01-20T11:42:30.049+0000)
>
> Yes i alwasy try to think what i did wrong, but i dont know. i never seem to know where i went wrong it just seems as i got very unlucky but i know its just me playing bad

it's not impossible to get unlucky, but at gold, I'd say it's mostly your fault, I've been crushing gold players on my smurf, you most likely need to improve on your decision making, and you need to understand the limits of the character you're playing, before you engage an enemy, are you positive the outcome will be in your favour? are you trading correctly? are you keeping up with cs? are you pushing towers? are you getting objectives? you need to just review your play and find flaws and improve.
